title: Mega Memory
description: I not only remember all the elements in the periodic table, I can even sing them backwards
descriptionpart: Good grades are dependent on how much your kids remember in an exam. This 30-day course massively improves their memory. Gift them a super power that they’ll never forget.
hover: recommended for kids who forget during exams

title: Happiness factory
description: I see a lot of adults who aren’t happy. Didn’t want to end up like them. Now I have learnt to manufacture happiness at will
descriptionpart: We think we know how to be happy, but we don’t. Why waste a lifetime seeking it, when you can find it in this 30-day course ? Gift them a super power, that no super hero has
hover: recommended for kids who wish to live happily ever after

title: Winning Habits
description: Now I know that habits can be built. So I will.
descriptionpart: You are what you do repeatedly. habits are what differentiate winners from losers. This 30-day course puts your kid on the path to success. Gift them a super power, that will make winning a habit.
hover: recommended for kids who wish to live happily ever after

title: Shy No More
description: The same teachers who complained about my shyness, are surprised now
descriptionpart: Speaking fearlessly is the final obstacle, at an interview or in front of an audience. For shy kids, this 30-day course is a blessing. Gift them a super power, that they cannot stop talking about
hover: recommended for kids who keep to themselves

title: Rich and How!
description: I can learn anything. But you have to give me 30 days
descriptionpart: Earning wealth is an art that can be learnt, but only if someone teaches you. This 30-day course is the best investment you’ll ever make. Gift them a super power, that you wish your parent had gifted you
hover: recommended for kids who want to get rich

title: Quick Learning
description: I can learn anything. But you have to give me 30 days
descriptionpart: Learning is easy. when you know how. This 30-day course spills the secrets of learning anything easily and quickly. Gift them a super power, that will make learning super simple
hover: recommended for kids who don’t like studying
